title: Roadmap
subtitle: The following milestones provide an insight into the 2026 roadmap to bring our AGIRDY vision to market readiness.

steps.title: MVP Release
steps.desc: AGIRDY Agent#1 with core agent workflows for minutes, tasks and decision briefs..

steps.title: Pilot Program
steps.desc: Own on-prem hardware with AGIRDY Agent#1 in first enterprise POCs.

steps.title: Scaleable Deployments
steps.desc: Standardized templates, industry packs and repeatable rollouts.

steps.title: Expansion
steps.desc: Global network scaling and enterprise API rollout.
